page.title: 12Treasure Island.
page.content: {Treasure Island} is at the back of Royal Parade. It is along the seafront.{It is mainly for children {between 3 and 10.}Young children up to 7 have their own corners with small bikes and cars. In one of the pools is a spouting whale and a crocodile; in another is a model lighthouse. There are free deckchairs {for mums {and dads} and a cafe with a patio area. The cafe sells everything from ice cream to sun oils. Children are perfectly safe without parents walking round with them. There is something for everyone - swings, see-saws, slides, climbing ropes, look-out towers, life-size animals, pools and sandpits and a big boat to climb on. The price is 40p for children and 50p for adults.
